option.name: title_text
option.value: How Do I Give Effective Feedback to My Students?

string_table.name: pxabnsnfns00000001101
string_table.string: Use the w, a, s, and d keys to move around the 360 degree image. Press the tab key to jump to interactive markers and hotspots.

slidelink.displaytext: Examples of Tangible and Transparent Feedback
